value.stringValue: CASE(Text([Task].Activity_Type__c),'01 - CE Testimonial - Success Story','Success Story', '02 - CE Testimonial - Written Testimonial','Written Testimonial', '06 - CE Testimonial - Video Testimonial','Video Testimonial', '06 - CE Testimonial - Case Study','Case Study','Missing Activity Type') & ' - ' & [Task].Company_Name__c

formulas.name: formula_16_myRule_15_A1_9538335674
formulas.expression: CASE(Text({!myVariable_current.Activity_Type__c}),'01 - CE Testimonial - Success Story','Success Story', '02 - CE Testimonial - Written Testimonial','Written Testimonial', '06 - CE Testimonial - Video Testimonial','Video Testimonial', '06 - CE Testimonial - Case Study','Case Study','Missing Activity Type') & ' - ' & {!myVariable_current.Company_Name__c}

value.stringValue: 'New ' & TEXT([Task].Activity_Type__c) & ' activity completed on ' & Case(Month([Task].ActivityDate ), 1,'Jan', 2,'Feb', 3,'Mar', 4,'Apr', 5,'May', 6,'Jun', 7,'Jul', 8,'Aug', 9,'Sep', 10,'Oct', 11,'Nov', 12,'Dec',null) & ' ' & TEXT(Day([Task].ActivityDate)) & ', ' & TEXT(Year([Task].ActivityDate))
